name: 陳文斌
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
本課程將複習各項力學 (包括靜力學、動力學、材料力學) 定理，並介紹各主要骨骼肌肉系統之生物力學，課程中以常見之問題為例實際應用各定理，並簡介生物力學相關領域之應用。
schedule:
課程進度
1.	Introduction
2.	Kinematic concepts for analyzing human motion
3.	Kinetic concepts for analyzing human motion
4.	Biomechanics of bone
5.	Biomechanics of bone
6.	Biomechanics of human articulations
7.	Biomechanics of human articulations
8.	Biomechanics of the foot and foot orthosis
9.	期中考
10.	Biomechanics of the foot and foot orthosis
11.	Biomechanics of the hip and hip prosthesis
12	Biomechanics of the knee & knee prosthesis
13.	Biomechanics of the spine and spinal implant
14	Paper oral presentation - I
15	Paper oral presentation - II
16	期末考
17	CAE in biomechanics (線上教學)
18	生物力學實驗室簡介 (綜合科館 802-2)
scorePolicy:
1. 平時成績 15%
2. 期中考 30%
3. 期末考 30%
4. 期末口頭及書面報告成績 25%
materials:
Basic Biomechanics 6th Edition, Susan J. Hall, WCB/McGraw Hill
Basic Biomechanics of the Musculoskeletal System, 3rd Ed. M. Nordin and V. H. Frankel
上課投影片
